title: The Heroic Week of Trent Baker
summary: Over one week, Trent Baker discovers his superpowers during his coaching sessions, thwarts a crime spree, and learns the responsibility that comes with great power.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche entdeckt Trent Baker seine Superkräfte während seiner Coaching-Sitzungen, vereitelt eine Verbrechensserie und lernt die Verantwortung, die mit großer Macht einhergeht.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt Trent Baker zijn superkrachten tijdens zijn coachingssessies, verijdelt een misdaadgolf en leert de verantwoordelijkheid die bij grote macht hoort.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, Trent Baker découvre ses superpouvoirs lors de ses séances de coaching, déjoue une série de crimes et apprend la responsabilité qui accompagne un grand pouvoir.

story.text: Trent Baker, a passionate coach, suddenly discovers he can manipulate time during a training session. He's taken aback but ecstatic about his newfound ability.
Trent uses his time-manipulation skills to rewind a few moments and prevent an accident during practice. His confidence grows.
News of an unknown hero in town spreads, giving Trent an eerie feeling of both excitement and uncertainty about his secret.
Deciding to embrace his powers, Trent stops a robbery in progress. He feels a rush of adrenaline and a sense of duty towards his community.
Trent meets Emily, a journalist keen on discovering the identity of the new hero. There's a spark between them, turning their professional meeting somewhat romantic.
During a major crisis involving a bridge collapse, Trent saves dozens, revealing his identity to Emily who promises to keep his secret.
Reflecting on the week’s events at his favorite quiet spot, Trent feels peaceful and ready to handle the responsibilities of his new role.

ending: Thus, Trent Baker embraced his role as a protector, balancing his life of coaching with his duties as a superhero, always aware that every day could require the hero within him.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
